text: I have a function that queries a website for data. When I use HTTP.jl it works, but when using `download` from Base, the server returns a message: `Request unsuccessful. Incapsula incident ID` . Which means I’m getting blocked somehow. I’d like to inspect what the actual request looks like from both tools - is there a way to intercept it?

. Which means I’m getting blocked somehow. I’d like to inspect what the actual request looks like from both tools - is there a way to intercept it?

text: It can go quite low level, and I haven't used it much personally but you could use Wireshark to look at the exact requests <https://www.wireshark.org/>
